prompt_base: raw photo, close up portrait of a (tiny blue alien creature:1.3), large pointed ears, jester hat, imperial tunic, sinister facial expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: wrinkled biological blue skin texture, detailed seams and stitching on tunic, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching hat fabric:1.2), sharp focus on face, cinematic lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human face, regular human height, organic skin, low quality, smooth skin
